law.catch_line: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

section.section:
"Dormitory" means a building or space in a building that:
is under joint occupancy and single management; and
provides group sleeping accommodations:
with or without meals, but without individual cooking facilities;
for more than 16 individuals who are not members of the same family group; and
in one room or in a series of closely associated rooms.
"Dormitory" includes a school dormitory, fraternity house, and military barracks.

text.section:
"Dwelling unit" means a single unit that:
provides complete, independent living facilities for one or more individuals; and
contains permanent provisions for living, sleeping, eating, cooking, and sanitation.

section.section:
"Hotel" means a building or group of buildings that:
is under the same management;
contains more than 16 sleeping accommodations for hire; and
is used primarily by transients who are lodged with or without meals.
"Hotel" includes an inn, motel, club, and apartment hotel.

"Lodging or rooming house" means a building:
in which separate sleeping rooms are rented; and
that provides sleeping accommodations:
for 16 or fewer individuals;
on either a transient or permanent basis; and
with or without meals, but without individual cooking facilities.
"Lodging or rooming house" includes an inn, club, and bed and breakfast establishment.

"Multifamily residential dwelling" means a building or part of a building that:
contains more than two dwelling units; and
is not classified as a one or two family dwelling.
"Multifamily residential dwelling" does not include a town house.

"Public water system" means a system that:
provides the public with piped water for human consumption; and
has at least 15 service connections or regularly serves at least 25 individuals.

"Public water system" includes:
a collection, treatment, storage, or distribution facility that is under the control of the operator of the system and is used primarily in connection with the system; and
a collection or pretreatment storage facility that is not under the control of the operator of the system and is used primarily in connection with the system.

text.section:
"Sprinkler system" means a device that:
opens automatically by operation of a heat responsive releasing mechanism;
discharges water in a specific pattern over a designated area to extinguish or control fire; and
uses the same service water supply pipe to the dwelling unit that the public water system uses.
"Town house" means a single family dwelling unit that is constructed in a horizontal series of attached units with property lines separating the units.
